text: Rero mugihe hashika umwanya wuguhonywa kwabo bantu babi intumwa y’Imana Shuaybu (iii) yaravuye muri ico gisagara hamwe n’abamwemeye aca abata kure nukwigira nukuvuga ati:- emwe bantu banje, nabashikirije ubutumwa bw’Umuremyi wanje, kandi nabahaye n’impanuro, mbega nteterwe hejuru yanyu mwebwe bahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri
